
### a fork question (2)  {.smaller}

```c
int x = 0;
int main() {
    pid_t pid = fork();
    int y = 0;
    if (pid == 0) {
        x += 1;
        y += 2;
    } else {
        x += 3;
        y += 4;
    }
    printf("%d %d\n", x, y);
}
```
